skins.selfIntroduction: I am the ninth ship of the Akizuki-class destroyers, Harutsuki. Due to various circumstances, I wasn't able to do much, but... I'll make up for it this time, Commander!
skins.acquisition: I was guided here by the gods... Ah! M-My name is Harutsuki! Pleased to meet you!
skins.details: Hyaa! C-Commander, when did you get here?
skins.secretaryIdle1: O gods, please bless this port so that everyone may come home safely.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yoizuki may seem cold, but she's very nice and is always thinking of everyone else!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Good luck! I'll... be supporting you!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander? Would you like to try the sakura mochi that I made?

skins.ENClientName: A Dance for the Coming Spring
skins.shipDescription: Happy New Year, Commander! I am currently on my way to give a Kagura dance at the shrine. If you have time... would you like to come see it?
skins.acquisition: Happy New Year, Commander! I am currently on my way to give a Kagura dance at the shrine. If you have time... would you like to come see it?
skins.login: All right, that should be all the rehearsing I need... C-Commander?! Just now, were you... watching me the whole time?
skins.details: Um, Commander... It's a bit embarrassing if you stare at me like that...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I practiced a lot for this... so I hope I can do a good job...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Fusou and Yamashiro went out of their way to practice with me! I'll have to make sure to thank them after this...!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Gods, please watch over everyone this year...
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you like this outfit that much?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: P-please stop that, Commander! You're going to mess up my clothes...
